==About Inkscape 0.48.4==
 Open Source vector graphics editor, with capabilities similar to Illustrator, CorelDraw, or Xara X, using the W3C standard Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) file format.
{{images/Inkscape.png}}
==Features of Inkscape 0.48.4==
# Inkscape supports many advanced SVG features (markers, clones, alpha blending, etc.)
# Great care is taken in designing a streamlined interface. 
# It is very easy to edit nodes, perform complex path operations, trace bitmaps and much more.
# We also aim to maintain a thriving user and developer community by using open, community-oriented development.
